info.name: QnA
info.description:
# Introduction
QnA app

# Overview


# Authentication
Session cookies

# Error Codes
* 200 OK
* 401 Unauthorized
* 404 Not Found
* 422 Unprocessable Entity
* 500 Internal Server Error

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

Return:
- session's information
- list of newest questions
- list of top favorites questions
- list of answered questions
- list of pending questions (only Editor)

urlencoded.value: Insert image into MYSQL Table using SQL Statement
need to insert images in MYSQL database table. The images are stored in the local disk. I am using LOAD_FILE() for inserting the images, but it only stores the path not the image.
Insert image into MYSQL Table using SQL Statement
need to insert images in MYSQL database table. The images are stored in the local disk. I am using LOAD_FILE() for inserting the images, but it only stores the path not the image.

header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
